sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function ExpertReviews() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [expandedId, setExpandedId] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/admin") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setProducts(data)) .catch((err) => console.error("Error loading products:", err)); }, []); const toggleExpand = (id) => { setExpandedId(expandedId === id ? null : id); }; const parseLines = (text) => typeof text === "string" ? text.split("\n").filter((line) => line.trim() !== "") : []; return (

Expert Reviews

Our in-depth analysis of each antivirus solution based on extensive testing.

{products.map((product) => (
{expandedId === product.ProductID && (

Our Review

{product.OurReview || "No review available."}

Pros:
    {parseLines(product.Pros).map((pro, i) => (
  • {pro}
    • ))}
Cons:
    {parseLines(product.Cons).map((con, i) => (
  • {con}
    • ))}
Bottom Line

{product.BottomLine || "Summary not available."}

Test Results
Malware Protection {product.MalwareProtection || "-"}/5
Performance Impact {product.PerformanceImpact || "-"}/5
User Interface {product.UserInterface || "-"}/5
Value for Money {product.ValueForMoney || "-"}/5
Protection Features
    {parseLines(product.ProtectionFeatures).map((feature, i) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
)}
))}
); } export default ExpertReviews;
